Text: yo, can one of that 3 greedy mofos, which escaped after reaching 100% at least confirm if it is working with PSgroove? rest are stuck before 65% and it is smallest PS3 game on TPB so i need it for testing :(

Although it is like a spin off of MotorStorm in my eyes, good test game because it'll fit on a 4GB USB :)
